ValidationRule.description: BGA contact information is required when Lead is qualified
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(( Contact__c ='' ) && (RecordTypeId =$Label.BGA_Honeywell_Prospect) &&(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Sales Qualified Lead')) &&(OR(( Email ='' && Primary_Fax_Number__c ='' && Primary_Work_Number__c =''),FirstName = '')), true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter any one of the following items: Primary Email or Primary Work Number or Primary Fax Number in "New Account or Contact Information" section for the Contact and FirstName.
